snippet: A spokeswoman for Discovery Channel said she could not speak definitively about the future, if any, of the popular reality show "Sons of Guns," which follows life in a custom gun-making company.
abstract: A spokeswoman for Discovery Channel said she could not speak definitively about the future, if any, of the popular reality show "Sons of Guns," which follows life in a custom gun-making company.

headline.main: Gun-Focused Reality TV Shows Get New Scrutiny After Newtown Killings
